SDG_GOAL: Objective 12. Establish sustainable consumption and production patterns
SDG_TARGET: 12.b Develop and use tools to monitor the impact on sustainable development of sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products
SDG_INDICATOR: 12.b.1 Number of strategies or policies in place in the field of sustainable tourism and action plans implemented by applying agreed assessment and monitoring tools
STAT_CONC_DEF: Number of strategies or policies in place in the field of sustainable tourism and action plans implemented by applying agreed assessment and monitoring tools
INST_MANDATE: Collect, process and disseminate sector data
RATIONALE: The indicator is relevant because it reflects the state of development of the tourism sector
REC_USE_LIM: The completeness of this indicator depends on the regular collection of data from the field
DATA_COMP: List of strategies or policies in place in the field of sustainable tourism and action plans implemented by applying agreed assessment and monitoring tools
COMPARABILITY: The indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international level
